long_description: Pepper's Sweet polarized sunglasses offer 100% UV protection from the sun on bright days. With classic styling, they're sure to please. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Triacetate lens construction sandwiches a polyvinyl acetate layer between 2 outer acetate layers. Grilamid(R) nylon lightweight frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature. Matte black frames feature brown polarized gold mirror polarized lenses for reduced glare and true color perception in bright light. Matte crystal grey frames feature brown polarized blue mirror lenses for reduced glare. Pepper's Sweet polarized sunglasses are designed to fit a medium-sized face.
short_description: Pepper's Sweet polarized sunglasses offer 100% UV protection from the sun on bright days. With classic styling, they're sure to please.
